last_phrase: In conclusion, to improve our attention and concentration, we must strive to maintain focus on the subject while inhibiting other mental processes and avoiding distractions. We can overcome natural tendencies to focus only on what is easy to understand by challenging ourselves to explore even the smallest details of our surroundings. By practicing this intentional observation, we can sharpen our senses and become more attentive without expending excessive effort, allowing us to better engage with the world around us and enhance our quality of life.
